law.catch_line: There shall be a Substance Abuse Treatment Outcomes Partnership Fund, established within the Departm...

text.section: There shall be a Substance Abuse Treatment Outcomes Partnership Fund, established within the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.
The Fund shall be administered according to this subtitle.

section.section: The Fund shall receive moneys as provided by the Governor in the State budget.
The Fund also may accept funds from local, nonprofit, or private organizations.
